item.title: RBS Ops Tax Refresh and Migration to Camunda goes live
item.content:encoded: RBS Operational Tax Solution on Camunda Microservice goes live replacing a legacy operational system that implements automated self-certification of bank customers across brands to satiny CRS and FATCA compliance and reporting.

item.title: Camunda Solution Partner
item.content:encoded: eMetrix Consulting has a unique understanding of processes and workflow automation in the financial industry. As a Camunda Solution Partner we support our projects with experienced architecture and technical delivery to integrate data, systems and processes. A wealth of expertise and knowledge is available to help our clients deliver exceptional Digital Experience and Journeys to their Customers.

item.title: RBS Website Migration to AEM 6.1 goes live
item.content:encoded: RBS Website Migration to AEM 6.1 goes live. Several RBS brand websites serving Personal and Business customer segments in the UK and Ireland were migrated to AEM 6.1

item.title: Adobe AEM Solution Partner
item.content:encoded: Adobe AEM Solution Partner. We are delighted to announce that eMetrix Consulting has been accepted as a Community AEM Solution Partner. A wealth of expertise and knowledge is available to help our clients deliver exceptional Digital Experience and Journeys to their Customers.

item.title: MyAccount signin service to mygovscot due to go live!
item.content:encoded: MyAccount signin service to mygovscot due to go live! Our latest project with the Improvement Service to refresh and renew a major national single sign on solution for Scotland …
